DOC.brief_summary: A randomized, open-label, single dosing, two-way crossover clinical trial to compare the safety/tolerability and pharmacokinetics of the combination of Cilnidipine 10mg and Valsartan 160mg in comparison to each component coadministered in healthy male volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Comparing Cilnidipine/Valsartan Combination Tablet With Coadministration of Cilnidipine and Valsartan
DOC.criteria: Age between 20 and 40 Signed informed consent Has a history of hypersensitivity to IP ingredients Hypertension or hyportension
